description.description: The description of the scheduled action.

enable.description: Whether to enable the scheduled action. Default is `true` .

endTime.description: The end time in UTC when the schedule is active, in UTC RFC3339 format(for example, YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ).

iamRole.description: The IAM role to assume to run the scheduled action.

schedule.description: The schedule of action. The schedule is defined format of "at expression" or "cron expression", for example `at(2016-03-04T17:27:00)` or `cron(0 10 ? * MON *)`. See [Scheduled Action](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/redshift/latest/APIReference/API_ScheduledAction.html) for more information.

startTime.description: The start time in UTC when the schedule is active, in UTC RFC3339 format(for example, YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ).
